channel.title: Out of memory
channel.description:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. ~~~ZymusScape by Zyle |~Enabled~| ~~~ ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1774 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1776 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
how do i fix this???[br][size=1]Posted on: February 20, 2007, 10:11:11 AM[/size][hr]can somone help me with this?????

item.title: Out of memory
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

Add this in your compile.

-Xmx512m

Change the 512 to whatever amount of RAM you have.

Read full topic
